headline: Gary Black Says Tesla Won't Be Alone In Solving Autonomy After Nvidia's Alpamayo Reveal: 'Expect Unsupervised Autonomy To Be Democratized Quickly'
summary: Future Fund LLC managing director Gary Black has said that Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) won't be the only company solving unsupervised autonomous driving, as Nvidia Corp. (NASDAQ:NVDA) revealed its Alpamayo autonomous technology. Tesla's Rivals Will Offer Unsupervised Autonomy The investor, in a post on the social media platform X on Wednesday, shared that people did not believe him when he said that rivals of the Elon Musk-backed automaker would also develop self-driving technology. Black said that
